duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with all team members to ensure all costs for team projects and accounts are understood and used in the determination of selling prices and relationship strategies.
Understand the impact of changes made by customers after the project has been awarded and launched to ensure the additional costs are promptly margined and invoiced.
Evaluate all customer purchase orders to ensure that they match company quotes and capture all understandings established with the customer.
Prepare monthly management review packages and drive meetings with the team and management team in conjunction with financials and analysis of key metrics.
Undertake special projects as assigned by senior management.
Investigate variances to plan unusual financial transactions timely to explain profitability and support the financial close process.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Accounting or Finance or other relevant area, 5+ years of experience in Finance or Accounting, solid understanding of cost accounting in a manufacturing or distribution environment.
